name: mFolio Lite
author: Themelooks

sections.description:
mFolio is WordPress Portfolio Plugin for Elementor. This all in one Modern Portfolio Collection allows you to showcase your portfolio, works and projects on your website in a modern and most impressive way using Elementor. You can upload photos, add descriptions, dates and more. It’s a WordPress plugin based on Elementor Page Builder. Anyone can easily update/edit this plugin by following our Well Sorted

Main Features of mFolio:

  • Compatibility with wordpress 6.0.2x
  • Pre-Built 14+ Modern Portfolio Variation
  • Pre-Built 7+ Portfolio Details Variation
  • Masonry Grid Style
  • Portfolio Gallery Style
  • Modern Portfolio Collection
  • Fully Responsive
  • Translation ready
  • Ready for translation ( .pot files included )
  • Free Updates
  • Error free code
  • Well and Online Documentation and Video Tutorials
Live Preview
Checkout Pro Version
Checkout Our Pro Profile
sections.installation:
The easy way.

Go to your WordPress Dashboard. Navigate to Plugins > Add New and then search for “mfolio-lite”. Click on Install and then Activate the Plugin.

That’s it, mfolio lite Plugin is now activated on your site!

The hard way..

Download “Mfolio Lite WordPress Plugin” and then extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compatable on latest WordPress ?

Yes
sections.changelog:

Fixed Elementor Deprecated Error Issue
